title: Expert witness reports (engineering, medical, forensic)
dataVerified: Expert name/credentials, claim details, opinions, methodology, compensation
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Report status (submitted). Link to expert firm system (legal parties and authorized verifiers, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fabricated expert reports. Domain binding verifies expert credentials/firm. High-stakes litigation. Large claim disputes ($100K-$10M+). Prevents opinion tampering. Multi-page: Expert reports are lengthy technical documents - per-page verification.
